Text.Language: Anioui m~Po#c#: n~ouw~ou nem outaio: a~nioui~ m~Po#c#: n~hanhumnoc m~pi[ro.
Present to the Lord, glory and honor, present to the Lord, praises of victory.
قدموا للرب مجداً وكرامة قدموا للرب تسابيح الغلبة.
Bwrp naf e~p~swi m~m/ni: n~hanhi/b n~at,arof: nem hanjw m~beri: nem hanyucia n~atc~nof.
Send up unto Him, always silent lambs, and new songs, and blood offerings.
أرسلوا له ألي فوق دائما حملانا غير ساكتة واناشيد جديدة وذبائح غير دموية.
Ge gar afyamion: ouoh a~non an pe: aftoubon aft~cabon: n~nimwit n~te t~ve.
For He created us, when we were nothing, He purified and taught us, the ways of heaven.
لأنه خلقنا واذ نحن لم نكن وطهرنا وعلمنا طرق السماء.
Dauid n~c/ou niben: efjoc qen oumeym/i: w~ouniatou n~ouon niben: etsop qen pek/i.
David says in truth, at all times, blessed are those who dwell, in Your house.
يقول داود في كل حين بالحقيقة طوبي لجميع الساكنين في بيتك.
Eie~i~ e~qoun: sa piman~erswousi: n~te Vnou] qen oumoun: eie~swt hanswouswousi.
I will enter, unto the altar of God, at all times, and offer oblations.
ادخل إلي مذبح الله دائماً واذبح الذبائح.
Ze ontwc qen ous~v/ri: a~ P,#c# pimairwmi: swp e~rof m~picebi: m~v~r/] n~nirwmi.
For truly it is wondrous, that Christ the Lover of Man, accepted circumcision, like men.
فعجباً بالحقيقة أن المسيح محب البشر قبل الختان مثل البشر.
?ppe gar Loukac: afcaji qen vai: eybe maciac: ouoh afc~qai.
For behold Luke, spoke of that, for the Messiah, and wrote and said.
لأن لوقا تكلم بهذا من أجل ماسيا وكتب.
Yebdwmac e~tack/n: aumou] e~rof: je I/#c# pe pefran: kata p~caji m~piaggeloc.
When the week was finished, His name was called, Jesus according, to the saying of the angel.
ولما كمل الاسبوع دُعي اسمه يسوع كقول الملاك.
Iwc/f nem Calwm/: nem Maria tefmau: e~taujwk m~pih~me: n~e~hoou e~te m~mau.
Joseph and Salome, and Mary His mother, when they finished, the forty days.
يوسف وسالومي ومريم امه لما اكملوا تلك الاربعين يوماً.
Ke palin ausenwou: e~p~/i n~]p~roceu,/: eyroui~ni e~jwou: n~hancwtp n~eu,/.
And also they went, to the house of prayers, to offer for themselves, the choice offerings.
وأيضاً ذهبوا إلي بيت الصلاة ليقدموا عنهما تقدمات مختارة.
Loipon gar aujimi: n~Cimwn piou/b: efo~hi e~ratf efsemsi: qen tefmetou/b.
They also have found, Simeon the priest, standing and serving, through his priesthood.
وأيضاً وجدوا سمعان الكاهن واقفاً يخدم في كهنوته.
Mpefera~mel/c: alla af] m~pefouoi: afolf qen oui/c: e~jen nefj~voi.
So he did not hesitate, but took the risk, and carried Him quickly, on his arms.
فلم يتهاون. بل بادر. وحمله بسرعة علي ذراعيه.
Nafjoc je Pa[oic: ]nou ,~na,a pekbwk: je n~yok pe e~takrwic: e~roi eyrinau e~rok.
And he said now O Lord, let your servant go, for You have kept me, to see You.
وكان يقول الآن ياسيدي اطلق عبدك لأنك حفظتني لكي أراك.
Xapina aci~: n~je Anna ]p~rov/t/c: ]cemne n~c~himi: acero~mologit/c.
And suddenly, Anna the prophetess, the meek woman, came and confessed.
وبغتة جاءت حنة النبية المرأة العفيفة واعترفت.
Ouoh naccaji eyb/tf: qaten ouon niben: ouoh pilaoc t/rf: naujoust e~rof n~c/ou niben.
And she spoke about Him, in front of everyone, for all the people, waited for Him at all times.
وكانت تتكلم من أجله أمام الجميع واذ كان كل انسان ينتظره كل حين.
Penn/b pimairwmi: Penouro P,#c#: afswp e~rof m~picebi: eyrefjwk m~pinomoc.
Our Master the Lover of Man, Christ our King, accepted to Himself the circumcision, to complete the Law.
سيدنا محب البشر ملكنا المسيح قبل الختان ليكمل الناموس.
Rasi ouoh yel/l: w~ p~genoc n~nirwmi: je Emmanou/l: afw~li n~nennobi.
Rejoice and be glad, O you sons of men, for Immanuel, has carried our sins.
افرحوا وتهللوا ياجنس البشر لان عمانوئيل حمل خطايانا.
Ce ontwc aftajro: m~pefjinerrwmi: afjwk m~penyebio: n~h~r/i qen pefcebi.
Yes in truth, He confirmed His Incarnation, and fulfilled our humbleness, by His circumcision.
نعم بالحقيقة ثبت تأنسه واكمل تواضعنا بختانه.
Tote aft~cabon: e~hanmwit n~te pioujai: ouoh afcw] m~mon: kata pefnis] n~nai.
Therefore He taught us, the ways of salvation, and He has saved us, according to His great mercy.
حينئذ علمنا طرق الخلاص وخلصنا كعظيم رحمته.
Uioc Yeoc n~yof: qen oua~l/yia: acmici m~mof: n~je y/eyouab Maria.
He is the Son of God, in truth and she, gave birth to Him, Saint Mary the Virgin.
هو ابن الله بالحقيقة قد ولدته القديسة مريم.
V/e~toufai m~mof: n~je nitaxic eth/p: afw~li m~mof: n~je Cimwn piou/b.
He who is carried, by the invisible hosts, was carried by, Simeon the priest.
الذي تحمله الرتب الخفية قد حمله سمعان الكاهن.
<ouab w~ P,#c#: qen tekoikonomia: ouats~]si e~roc: te tekjwm nem tekcovia.
Holy are You O Christ, in Your precepts, and unlimited is, Your power and wisdom.
قدوس أيها المسيح في تدبيرك وغير محدودة هي قوتك وحكمتك.
"epi m~peklaoc: matal[o n~nouswni: nem n/e~tauenkot Po#c#: a~ripoumeui~.
And the rest of Your people, heal their sicknesses, and those who departed, O Lord remember them.
وسائر شعبك اشف أمراضهم والذين رقدوا يارب اذكرهم.
Wcautoc pekbwk: a~nok qa pirefernobi: ]]ho e~rok: ,w n/i e~bol n~nanobi.
Likewise I Your servant, the sinner, I entreat You, to forgive me my sins.
كذلك انا عبدك الخاظئ أتوسل اليك أن تغفر لي خطاياي.
